sentence: Republican state lawmakers in Ohio have introduced a bill mirroring Florida's controversial 'Don't Say Gay' bill +8 View gallery Republicans control both houses of the state legislature, but it is unclear whether Governor Mike DeWine (above), a moderate Republican, would support the new bill 'Children deserve a quality education that is fair, unbiased and age appropriate,' Loychik said in a statement.
